mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where del = 'N'

select rnum, mnum, bdiv, reserName, content, reserDate, kindCd, sexCd, age, specialMark, processState, noticeSdt, happenPlace, dogImg, careNm, careAddr, careTel, chargeNm from reservation where del = 'N'
order by rnum desc limit #{start}, #{count}

select rnum, mnum, bdiv, reserName, content, reserDate, kindCd, sexCd, age, specialMark, processState, noticeSdt, happenPlace, dogImg, careNm, careAddr, careTel, chargeNm from reservation where del = 'N' and rnum=#{rnum}
mapper.delete: update reservation set del='Y' where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(mnum, bdiv, reserName, content, reserDate, kindCd, sexCd, age, specialMark, processState, noticeSdt, happenPlace, dogImg, careNm, careAddr, careTel, chargeNm) values(#{mnum}, #{bdiv}, #{reserName}, #{content}, #{reserDate}, #{kindCd}, #{sexCd}, #{age}, #{specialMark}, #{processState}, #{noticeSdt}, #{happenPlace}, #{dogImg}, #{careNm}, #{careAddr}, #{careTel}, #{chargeNm})
